text: I have a test plan with a http request(with parameters) and also have an assertion that fails based on the text in the response. The test fails when i run it in gui mode when expected but the same test will not set failureproperty appropriately when the test fails from the gui mode. I am using an ant task to run from the cmd line. Please help
creator: vidi00@hotmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
BugZilla is not a support forum , please subscribe to JMeter User Mailing list.
If you find it's really a bug, please submit a Test Plan and the full Test scenario.
